title: Rilke State Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic state definition in the given or default project.

name.description: The name of the new state.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the state?

path.description: The path at which to create the state, relative to the workspace root.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new state.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

flat.description: When true, creates files at the top level of the project.

layer.description: Determine which layer it belongs to.

x-prompt.message: Which layer would you like to use it in?

module.x-prompt: Which NgModule would you like to use this service?

skipProvide.description: Do not provide this interceptor into the owning NgModule.

ready.description: When true, creates files with ready made code.
